body.p: Formed by the convergence of the Allegheny River and Monongahela River at Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Forms the northern border of Kentucky from Catlettsburg, Kentucky, until flowing into the Mississippi River near Cairo, Illinois, and Ballard County, Kentucky.
